 data (uint256[2*N+2]) - required data to form the signature where N is the number of Public Keys (ring size)
    //      data[0] - index from 0 to (N-1) specifying which Public Key has a known private key
    //      data[1] - corresponding private key for PublicKey[k]
    //      data[2   ... 2+(N-1)] - Random Numbers - total of N random numbers
    //      data[2+N ... 2*N+1  ] - Public Keys (compressed) - total of N Public Keys
    //      e.g. N=3; data = {k"," PrivateKey_k"," random0"," random1"," random2"," PubKey0"," PubKey1"," PubKey2 }

//Input RingSign()
[0,"0x1db3758a281094d841e4bdb7806caacedf0d2f542a13b23800e80a0c65e3aeec","0x0cc488357dc8185ce1db0fef9d4481c501d55bfb532cb75f27c94114daaa51cb","0x27ae12db1e427eebb552db51dd94e76fff3406542f0a6fd4b2dad70e57284636","63958223175057037167234516595089359974385414872313724351169331835229710527373","15019080540534752266550391547203058753160720337724713591877557523732502283182"]
//Output RingSign()
["62145712728878853043286712042401553185197489820545073988942621952795788248778","12142521286290157200313394957808676297562591673949502613470751362686540430829","21351022499775208467294310333886811796633344041817383147868746006579572778580","17947762622868113885056468002775174327628571127821228093823398696531958187574","63958223175057037167234516595089359974385414872313724351169331835229710527373","15019080540534752266550391547203058753160720337724713591877557523732502283182","16927900537340401896925804406212960440754492525596358146276190104421641717774","79232631877312769350243100379860822897166064037372243309460071995331970110229"]

Mix-in public key 1 (x): 0x2e42fca41d224473aa86a332c13b44ee3411fb51ddeb475e98b620a84415bced
Mix-in public key 1 (y): 0xd1f3a50ca57c544e3b3f1e87c1b1d53034c4186449d33d7c7b30ce2768ad1dc
